data.name: Bitbucket Server Dark
data.description:
A dark theme specifically for Bitbucket Server installations. Don't expect it to play nice with bitbucket.org.

(Tested on Bitbucket Server v5.4.8 previously, and now on v6.6.1)

data.name: Messenger Meddow
data.description:
Adds a nice Green Gradient to Facebook Messenger. 
This is a single day style and I will not be keeping it updated. Screenshots not provided because it is too much effort to blur out all the personal data.

data.name: UnrealEngine AnswerHub Dark Theme
data.description:
Dark theme for Epic games Unreal Engine 4 Answer Hub
Discussion Thread for this theme on Unreal Forums.
Donations always appreciated.

p.s.: take a look on my other themes for UnrealEngine website here

data.name: ServiceNow Dark - by GestDevelopment
data.description:
This is a (work in progress) dark theme for ServiceNow that i make in my free time.
NOTE: This was made for the Cobalt Contrast UI, If you aren't using this theme, the colors might clash.
If you have any feedback or items that still need a coat of paint. Please let me know, with a screenshot or something.
